items.title: Certifications
items.text:
Including:
  • TypeScript & Next.js 14: Building a Tech Ticketing App - Jacob Lower
  • Next.js & React - The Complete Guide - Maximilian Schwarzmüller
  • Modern React with Redux - Stephen Grider
  • The Complete JavaScript Course 2019: Build Real Projects! - Jonas Schmedtmann
  • Git a Web Developer Job: Mastering the Modern Workflow - Brad Schiff

items.title: Courses on various platforms
items.text:
Some platforms that I suggest are:
  • udemy.com
  • scrimba.com
  • freecodecamp.org
  • And of course Youtube channels, such as: Traversy Media, Programming with Mosh, Wes Bos

items.title: Books & Newsletters
items.text:
Some examples are:
  • Head First JavaScript Programming - O'Reilly
  • Everything you need to ace computer science and coding in one big fat notebook - Workman Publishing
  • Medium
  • Josh Comeau
  • Becoming a Better Front-End Developer - Edi Rodriguez
